title: Newtons second law - two crates with string

content.question: Crate <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> of mass <math alttext="m sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> is connected to Crate <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> of mass <math alttext="m sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> by a string with negligible mass. The crates are on a rough, horizontal surface. Crate <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> is pulled to the right with constant acceleration by a force of constant magnitude <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math>. Crate <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> experiences a friction force <math alttext="lowercase f sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math> and Crate <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> experiences a friction force <math alttext="lowercase f sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, both of which are less than <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math>. After a short period of time, the string breaks. The force <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math> continues to be exerted on Crate <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>. Which of the following are correct expressions for the magnitude <math alttext="a sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math> of the acceleration of Crate <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and the magnitude <math alttext="a sub center of mass" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>a</mi><mtext>cm</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> of the acceleration of the two-crate system’s center of mass after the string breaks?
